channel.title: 317 Starter Help!
channel.description:
Right now im using a delta 317. I am using a command for my starter.
is there a way to limit the command to just one use?
if not then i have nothing for the addstarter at all.
So i can't search the item or search addstarter because there isn't one. So could you guys tell me the exact position of it?
just answer one of these two questions correctly and i will + rep!

item.title: 317 Starter Help!
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

You can’t rep , and just declare starter to == 1 when you do the command. Have it as a check in the command else if starter == 1 then SM(No);

Read full topic
